projects.name: Weather Buddy
projects.description: Weather Buddy is a simple and user-friendly weather app created using React and the OpenWeather API. It allows users to check real-time weather details of any city, providing information such as humidity, weather conditions, and wind speed.

projects.name: LVease: Leave Management System
projects.description: Streamline employee leave management with our efficient and user-friendly Leave Management System. Easily request, track, and manage leaves. Enhance HR productivity and ensure smooth workforce planning.

projects.name: Netflix Clone
projects.description: A Netflix UI clone replicates Netflix's interface using HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity, allowing users to browse and view streaming content similarly to the original platform.

projects.name: Paytm Clone
projects.description: A Paytm UI clone created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript replicates Paytm's interface design, including features like payment options, transactions, and user authentication, providing a visually and functionally similar experience to the original platform.

projects.name: Lernr
projects.description: Lernr LMS: A Node.js and MongoDB-based learning management system offering course variety. Features include login, logout, and signup functionalities for user accounts.

projects.name: Blog Site
projects.description: A blog site built with Next.js integrates Sass for styling, utilizes API fetch for data retrieval, and implements CRUD functionality for managing content, enabling seamless creation, reading, and deletion of blog posts.

projects.name: Travel
projects.description: Welcome to the Travel Landing Page! This is a captivating landing page designed for a travel-related website, meant to engage and inspire visitors to explore the world.

projects.name: Quote Generator
projects.description: A simple project generating random quotes upon button click, implemented with JavaScript for functionality and basic HTML/CSS for structure and styling.
